"Summer Resort Plan!":
"The bright sky! The sun shining bright!
The arrival of Summer!
When you mention summer, what do you get?
Yes! Summer resorts!
With that, let us plan something great this year
also at the coastal area!
To ensure that everyone can enjoy themselves with
peace of mind, please subjugate the
Oceanid species near the location!
*Target Oceanid species"

"眩しい空！　光り輝く太陽！　夏到来！
夏といえば？　そう！　サマーリゾート！
ってなわけで、今年も海岸で
ステキな計画を立ててます！

みんなが安心して楽しめるように
会場付近の海王種討伐をお願いします！

※海王種が対象"
